root.name: X-COM: Enforcer
root.description: X-Com: Enforcer differs from the previous squad strategy games and space simulator by being a third-person action shooter based off of the Unreal Tournament technology. As the titular Enforcer, the player's task is to rid of alien infestation while recovering hostages, data points, and researchable objects. X-Com Enforcer was generally poorly received by fans of the franchise.
